info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:27AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Rock Island, northwestern Mercer, central Louisa, southern Cedar, southwestern Scott, southeastern Johnson and Muscatine Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 127 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tipton to near Lone Tree. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Rock Island, Muscatine, Tipton, West Branch, Durant, West Liberty, Wilton, Walcott, Blue Grass, Lone Tree, Buffalo, Andalusia, Fruitland, Hills, Grandview, Conesville, Eliza, Bennett and Letts. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 255 and 285. Interstate 280 between mile markers 5 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
